column4: Hey Guys need some help investigating wether my box was comprimised or not
if you have any reason to suspect the box has been compromised you should a) disconnect it from the network, and b) wipe it
no i didn't it was typing commands and then at the end said "You Got Owned" and the shut down firefox
possibly some malicious javascript on a dodgy site
unlikely, thats probably a cron job
ubuntu doesn't have a root user activated
have you installed all pending security updates?
do you have a password on your root account?
- i have no outstanding updates waiting to be applied
i cant look at your log right now, do you see root logging in okay _from_ that dodgy IP address ?
where does it say root logged in from?
in your log, where do you see root logging in from? what IP or hostname?
if it's anything _other_ than localhost then there may be an issue
where is the success logon as root?
